question: What is the name of the special “Yoga Module” developed by India’s Permanent Mission to the UN to mark International Yoga Day 2020?
option1: Yoga for Health – Yoga at Home
answer: Yoga for Health – Yoga at Home
explanation:
India’s Permanent Mission to the UN has recently developed a special Yoga Module, to mark International Yoga Day 2020.
The International Yoga Day is celebrated on June 21, every year across the world. To commemorate this year’s Yoga Day, the Permanent Mission of India to the UN has created a special yoga module, ‘Yoga for Health – Yoga at Home’, along with yoga teachers and therapists. The module has yoga exercises, breathing and meditation practices to improve physical and mental health.
